body: ### What are you really trying to do? Call MCP server using StreamableHTTPClientTransport. ### Describe the bug The MCP Client close the connection before the tool call: File: @temporalio\ai-sdk\lib\activities.js Function: callToolActivity Line 66: return tool.execute(args.input, args.options); It must be return **await** tool.execute(args.input, args.options); After this adjustment everything works as expected:
title: [Bug] AI-SDK - callToolActivity
